item.title: Some learnings about Bitcoin
item.description: In 2016, I attended a talk given by Andreas Antonopolous at a Bitcoin meetup in downtown San Francisco. Coming into the talk, I had thought very little about Bitcoin, or “blockchain” technology more generally. The way that Andreas spoke about Bitcoin and the economic, social, and technical implications that it has for our world was nothing short of inspiring. I emerged with a profound curiosity for this new monetary technology and what it might mean about the future.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I hope to share my thoughts on programming, music, math, bitcoin, cryptography, and more.
